Class Bike

java.lang.Object
Vehicle.Vehicle

All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Bike extends Vehicle implements Serializable
Represents a Bike object. Inherits from the Vehicle class.

      Constructs a Bike object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      brand - the brand of the bike
      model - the model of the bike
      year - the year of the bike
      hourlyRentalCost - the hourly rental cost of the bike
      dailyRentalCost - the daily rental cost of the bike
      bikeType - the type of the bike
      fuelLevel - the fuel level of the bike

    • calculateShortRentalCost

      public double calculateShortRentalCost(int hours)
      Calculates the cost of a short-term rental for the bike. The cost is calculated based on the bike type and the number of hours rented.
      Specified by:
      calculateShortRentalCost in class Vehicle
      Parameters:
      hours - the number of hours the bike is rented for
      Returns:
      the cost of the short-term rental

    • calculateRentalCost

      public double calculateRentalCost(int days)
      Calculates the rental cost for the bike based on the number of days. The rental cost includes the daily rental cost of the bike and additional costs for the helmet.
      Specified by:
      calculateRentalCost in class Vehicle
      Parameters:
      days - The number of days for which the bike is rented.
      Returns:
      The total rental cost for the bike.
